column4: Hi, I have a dual booting machine and I can no longer see windows in the bootloader. How can I get it back?
Was that an answer for me?
What is the output of "sudo os-prober"?

os-prober is a script which searches for operating systems and outputs information about them which can be used by other programs. update-grub uses os-prober to add windows to your grub.cfg, so without os-prober installed update-grub won't find windows.
